metadata.title: CVE-2016-2499 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: AudioSource.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-06-01does not initialize certain data, which allows attackers to obtainsensitive information via a crafted application, aka internal bug 27855172.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
